name: PeacefulMusic
0:
”Alexa, Play Peaceful Music”
”Alexa, Start Peaceful Music”
”Alexa, Open Peaceful Music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peaceful music
des:
It allows you to create a relaxing and meditative environment no matter where you are or what time it is!

It relieves tension and makes you feel better by relaxing your body and mind!

This is the excellent soundtrack for meditation, yoga, tai chi, healing, and total relaxation.

Your positive feedback encourages us to develop fantastic skills like this one. Please show your support by sending your ideas to voice.tech.now@gmail.com if you haven't already.

More information: 
Deep sleep, meditation, and relaxation are all made easier by Voice Tech Now. It's one of the most relaxing noises. Our soothing sleep music can be used as background music, meditation music, relaxation music, tranquil music, or sleep sounds. Allow the relaxing and pleasant noises to assist you in unwinding.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
